post.text:
Como candidato, Donald Trump ya nos está avergonzado ante el resto del mundo.

Imagínate como presidente.

comment.author: Codey
comment.text: Give me your tired, your poor, Your huddled masses yearning to breathe free, The wretched refuse of your teeming shore. Thou warden of the western gate, above Manhattan Bay, The fogs of doubt that hid thy face are driven clean away: Thine eyes at last look far and clear, thou liftest high thy hand To spread the light of liberty world-wide for every land.

replies.author: Brian
replies.text: we love you Hillary , Open borders =The Reconquista , we already have California , AZ is next.

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: As long as they follow the laws to come here legally and stop jumping the border. What don't you understand?

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: About a billion people in the world live below the poverty line. Would you accept them all?

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: Not for criminals. It's against the law to cross. Why doesn't mejico let Central Americans into mejico? Get real
